Class SubscriberDAO

java.lang.Object
DataBase.dao.SubscriberDAO
public class SubscriberDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for subscriber management.

Handles persistence and retrieval of subscriber data, including registration, authentication, profile access, and lookup by member code or barcode.

  • Method Details

    • insertSubscriber

      public static void insertSubscriber(String username, String password, String name, String phone, String email, Date birthDate) throws Exception
      Inserts a new subscriber into the system.

      Automatically generates a member code and barcode. If birth date is missing, defaults to current date to prevent database errors.

      Parameters:
      username - unique subscriber username
      password - subscriber password
      name - full name
      phone - phone number
      email - email address
      birthDate - subscriber birth date (nullable)
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getAllSubscribers

      public static List<SubscriberDTO> getAllSubscribers() throws Exception
      Retrieves all subscribers for staff/agent view.

      Returns basic subscriber details without sensitive data.

      Returns:
      list of subscribers
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • checkLogin

      public static boolean checkLogin(String username, String password) throws Exception
      Validates subscriber login credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - subscriber username
      password - subscriber password
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getEmailByUsername

      public static String getEmailByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Retrieves subscriber phone number by username.
      Parameters:
      username - subscriber username
      Returns:
      phone number or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getPhoneByUsername

      public static String getPhoneByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getProfileByMemberCode

      public static ProfileDTO getProfileByMemberCode(String memberCode) throws Exception
      Retrieves subscriber profile details by member code.

      Used for profile display and updates.

      Parameters:
      memberCode - unique member code
      Returns:
      populated ProfileDTO or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • updateProfileByMemberCode

      public static boolean updateProfileByMemberCode(ProfileDTO dto) throws Exception
      Updates subscriber profile details using member code.
      Parameters:
      dto - profile data transfer object
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getMemberCodeByUsername

      public static String getMemberCodeByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

      public static String getUsernameByBarcodeData(String barcodeData) throws Exception
      Retrieves member username by barcodeData.
      Parameters:
      barcodeData -
      Returns:
      member code or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error
